[Teleport to Hunting Grounds]
You may teleport to any of the following hunting locations. Each teleport requires a sum of ancient adena.
Pilgrim's Necropolis (30-40) - 3900 AA
Necropolis of Worship (40-50) - 11000 AA

Catacomb of the Heretic (30-40) - 2600 AA
Catacomb of the Branded (40-50) - 5900 AA
